info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 8:16AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Henderson, southern Warren and northeastern McDonough Counties through 845 AM CDT... At 815 AM CDT, emergency management reported a strong thunderstorm over Good Hope, or near Macomb, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Sciota around 820 AM CDT. Little Swan Lake around 830 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Roseville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
